com.heroiclabs.nakama

Interface Session

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSession

    public interface Session
    A session used with requests sent to Nakama server.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthToken

        java.lang.String getAuthToken()
        Returns:
        The authentication token used to construct this session.

      • getRefreshToken

        java.lang.String getRefreshToken()
        Returns:
        The refresh token used to construct this session.

      • isCreated

        boolean isCreated()
        Returns:
        True if the user account for this session was just created.

      • getCreateTime

        long getCreateTime()
        Returns:
        The timestamp in seconds when this session object was created.

      • getExpireTime

        long getExpireTime()
        Returns:
        The timestamp in seconds when this session will expire.

      • IsExpired

        boolean IsExpired()
        Returns:
        True if the session has expired against the current time.

      • isRefreshExpired

        boolean isRefreshExpired()
        If the refresh token has expired.

      • isRefreshExpired

        boolean isRefreshExpired(java.util.Date dateTime)
        If the refresh token has expired.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - The time to compare against the refresh token against.
        Returns:
        true if the refresh token has expired.

      • getRefreshExpireTime

        long getRefreshExpireTime()
        The UNIX timestamp when the refresh token will expire.

      • getUsername

        java.lang.String getUsername()
        Returns:
        The username of the user who owns this session.

      • getUserId

        java.lang.String getUserId()
        Returns:
        The ID of the user who owns this session.

      • isExpired

        boolean isExpired(java.util.Date dateTime)
        Check if the session has expired against the input time.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - The time to compare against the session.
        Returns:
        true if the session has expired.

      • getVars

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getVars()
        Returns:
        Get session vars.

      • update

        void update(java.lang.String token,
            java.lang.String refreshToken)
        In-place update a session with new token/refresh-token.
        Parameters:
        token - Authentication token.
        refreshToken - Refresh token.
